author: RTÉ News
title: Priests pay heavy price in Italian virus outbreak
description: They preside over funerals, comfort the sick, and are often themselves elderly: in the coronavirus crisis in Italy, priests are paying a heavy price.
content:
They preside over funerals, comfort the sick, and are often themselves elderly: in the coronavirus crisis in Italy, priests are paying a heavy price.
"A priest is always close to the people. For good or bad, it's his raison d'etre," said Monsignor Giulio Del… [+1553 chars]
